org.apache.flink.graph.drivers.parameter

类 ParameterizedBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.graph.drivers.parameter.ParameterizedBase
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Parameterized
    直接已知子类:
    DriverBase, GraphKeyTypeTransform, InputBase, OutputBase, Runner

    public abstract class ParameterizedBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements Parameterized
    Base class for a Parameterized which maintains a list of parameters used to print the command-line usage string and configure parameters.

    • 字段概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • addParameter

        public void addParameter(Parameter<?> parameter)
        Adds a parameter to the list. Parameter order is preserved when printing the command-line usage string.
        参数:
        parameter - to add to the list of parameters

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        从接口复制的说明: Parameterized
        A unique, human-readable identifier. Presented to the user as the name of a selectable choice.
        指定者:
        getName 在接口中 Parameterized
        返回:
        parameter name

      • getUsage

        public java.lang.String getUsage()
        从接口复制的说明: Parameterized
        Human-readable format for the command-line usage string.
        指定者:
        getUsage 在接口中 Parameterized
        返回:
        command-line documentation string

      • configure

        public void configure(ParameterTool parameterTool)
               throws ProgramParametrizationException
        从接口复制的说明: Parameterized
        Read parameter values from the command-line arguments.
        指定者:
        configure 在接口中 Parameterized
        参数:
        parameterTool - parameter parser
        抛出:
        ProgramParametrizationException - when configuration is invalid
